sen.j: 槍奉行（やりぶぎょう）は、江戸幕府に置かれた役職のひとつ。
sen.e: Yari-bugyo is a post in the Edo shogunate.
Yari-bugyo was a post in the Edo shogunate.
Yari-bugyo was a post in the Edo shogunate.

sen.j: 老中の支配を受け、3人から5人が任命された。
sen.e: Three to five persons were appointed to the post under the roju (elder).
Three to five persons were appointed the post under the roju (member of shogun's council of elders).
Three to five persons were appointed the post under the roju (member of shogun's council of elders).

sen.j: 幕府における槍に関する事務をつかさどったが、平時においては閑職であったようである。
sen.e: The post represented the administration of spears in the bakufu government but was an easy job during times of peace.
The post took charge of administration of spears in the shogunate but was an easy job during times of peace.
sen.cmt: 動詞変更、冠詞削除、２つ前のセルに合わせ、幕府をshogunateとしました。
sen.e: The post took charge of administration of spears in the shogunate but was an easy job during times of peace.

sen.j: 長柄槍組同心と八王子千人同心頭を統括した。
sen.e: The posts were supervised by the Nagara spear fighters unit and the Hachioji Sennin Doshin
The post supervised the Nagara spear fighters unit and the Hachioji Sennin Doshin.
sen.cmt: 単数化、原文から、「統括された」のではなく「統括した」に変更しました。ピリオド追加。
sen.e: The post supervised the Nagara spear fighters unit and the Hachioji Sennin Doshin.
